metadata.title: CVE-2024-36600 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow Vulnerability in libcdio v2.1.0 allows an attacker toexecute arbitrary code via a crafted ISO 9660 image file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-36600` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcdio++1t64 - 2.1.0-4.1ubuntu1.2
libcdio-utils - 2.1.0-4.1ubuntu1.2
libcdio19t64 - 2.1.0-4.1ubuntu1.2
libiso9660++0t64 - 2.1.0-4.1ubuntu1.2
libiso9660-11t64 - 2.1.0-4.1ubuntu1.2
libudf0t64 - 2.1.0-4.1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libcdio package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.0-4.1ubuntu1.2').
